name: Learning Resources Minute Math Electronic Flash Card - Classroom Must Haves, Homeschool Supplies, Math Manipulatives, Multiplication Chart, Educational Toys for Toddlers, Back to School
short_description: MASTERY OF MATH FACTS - Practice all four operations (addition, subtraction, multiplication, division) with this portable electronic flash card that strengthens math fluency
TIMED CHALLENGES - Turn math practice into an engaging game with one-minute timed challenges that prepare students for classroom timed tests while improving recall speed.
ADJUSTABLE DIFFICULTY LEVELS - Three progressive skill levels accommodate learners from first grade through middle school, allowing the device to grow with your child's math abilities.
SILENT MODE OPTION - Easily disable sounds by holding the level button, making it perfect for quiet practice in waiting rooms, car rides, or classrooms without disturbing others.
CLASSROOM & HOME - Used by teachers for learning stations and by parents for supplemental practice, this educational tool has helped thousands of children improve test scores.
product_description: Product Description Turn learning math into a fun, interactive game with the Minute Math Electronic Flash Card. Kids will be excited to see how many answers they get right in a minute as they race to become the next math champion. This educational device teaches math fact families through two different modes: addition/subtraction and multiplication/division, with three adjustable skill levels that grow with your child. Perfect for ages 6+ and grades 1+, it helps students master essential math facts while improving speed and accuracy. The durable, triangle-shaped unit measures 5-1/2"H and features convenient volume control (with silent mode option) for practice anywhere—in the classroom, car rides, or waiting rooms. Teachers recommend it for learning stations and homework reinforcement, noting significant improvements in test scores and math fluency. The fact family approach helps students understand the relationship between operations (like how multiplication and division are connected), building a stronger foundation for more advanced math concepts. Unlike traditional flashcards that get scattered or lost, this electronic version keeps everything in one place while providing immediate feedback on answers. Requires 3 AAA batteries, not included. From the Manufacturer Build number fact fluency in just a minute. Familiar fact family triangle is now electronic. Practice operations (add/subtract or multiply/divide) and early algebraic skills (equations and commutative property). Offers 60-second timed mode; low-pressure, untimed mode; and 3 levels of difficulty. Color-coded screen frames reinforce parts of the equation. Gives positive, corrective feedback (visual and auditory). Durable unit with volume control measures 5 1/2"H. Requires 3 AAA batteries, not included. For individual practice or two students taking turns.
product_details: Manufacturer recommended age 6 years and up

name: JoyCat Flash Cards for Kids Ages 4-8, Math Flash Cards & Chart, Math Learning Tools Game for Addition Subtraction Division Multiplication, Fit for Kindergarten 1st 2nd 3rd 4th 5th 6th Grade
short_description: Math Skill Development: With our addition, multiplication, subtraction, division, and math mat flash cards, you can assist your child in learning the fundamentals of math. At any age, this math game set is ideal for strengthening calculation skills and developing early math abilities

Efficient Learning: Every math fact from 1 to 12 is covered by the 288 math flashcards. Instead of 1 equation, each card has 2 back-to-back equations! The answers are easy to practice and review as they are conveniently located in the opposite side's bottom corner

Easy to Use and Organized: As these flashcards are hole-punched, you can use the 4 metal rings that come with them to easily organize the cards and make sure you never lose any. They are easy to sort and arrange thanks to the colored borders

Long-Lasting Quality and Sturdy: A mat, 4 organizing rings, 1 storage bag, and 72 flash cards for addition, multiplication, subtraction, and division,respectively, are included in the math learning tools set. Youngsters can write their answers on the cards, which they can then edit and modify over time
Scientifically Designed: The JoyCat math mat, which is separated into calculation and answer areas, helps children learn math calculations more precisely

name: School Zone Division 0-12 Flash Cards: 56 Cards, 3rd Grade, 4th Grade, Math Equations, Elementary Math, Division Practice, Dividends, Numbers 0-12, Ages 9+
product_description: BUILD MATH SKILLS : These Division 0–12 Flash Cards feature 110 problems to build fluency with basic division facts, all related to multiplication skills. Mastering division supports understanding of multiplication, fractions, percentages, and algebra basics, making this set a strong foundation for future math success. MAKE LEARNING FUN : Bold, colorful flash cards make math feel more like play. Use them to self-test or heat up a little competitive action with friends and family. Playing together is a great way to learn verbal communication, cooperation, and patience. Do speed drills, play games, and change it up! PORTABLE & CONVENIENT : Large 3”x 5” double-sided cards have easy-to-sort rounded corners. Find the answer to each problem on the flipside of each card. This multi-set pack is great for home, classroom, or on-the-go learning! PACKAGE INCLUDES : (1) Division 0-12 Flash Card Set (56 cards). Set includes an assortment of game, answer, and parent cards, and features 110 division equations selected out of the 169 possible for numbers 0–12. We ensured that every divisor from 0 to 12 is represented, though not all equation combinations are included. DEVELOPED IN THE USA : School Zone learning materials have helped educate three generations of kids, creating lifelong learners, and it all takes place here in the USA. Digital content, flash cards, workbooks, readers, and games―all are crafted through a child's eyes with teacher guidance and parent approval. Read more

product_description: Subtraction Math Fact Flash Cards Turn your child’s math lessons into fun, educational games that bring learning to life with Carson Dellosa’s Subtraction Flash Cards! Subtraction Flash Cards are a great way for students to learn basic math skills through a fun, hands-on math game that is both fun AND educational for 1st grade math and beyond. Why You’ll Love These Subtraction Flash Cards Engaging and educational subtraction math game for kids. Kids practice subtraction facts 0 through 12 with over 100+ math problems. The kids flash cards are made with a glossy cardstock finish and rounded edges for easy flipping and sorting during practice. Bonus resource cards feature extension math games for even more learning fun! Checking accuracy along the way. Each of the 1st grade flash cards are double sided with a problem on one side and the answer on the reverse. Practically sized for on-the-go fun! Each flash card measures 3 ¼” x 5 ¼” — the perfect size to take along on road trips and fit in most bags to practice essential subtraction skills from just about anywhere!
